description: Defines the standard file structure for a Shopify OS 2.0 theme. Used by the Theme Generator as a skeleton.

config.settings_schema.json: Defines global theme settings (colors, typography, etc.)
config.settings_data.json: Stores the actual values for the settings

layout.theme.liquid: The master layout file. Contains <head>, <body>, and {{ content_for_layout }}.

sections.header.liquid: Sticky header with logo and navigation
sections.hero.liquid: Hero banner with image and text overlay
sections.product-grid.liquid: Grid of products for collection pages

snippets.css-variables.liquid: CSS custom properties derived from settings

templates.cart.json: JSON template for the cart page
